CustomField.description: Pages that are listening to this page during flow navigation. In other words, the pages that are depending on the values/conditions from this page. The flow rules of those listening pages will be triggered after this page's process is completed. This will determine page queues in the flow.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Pages that are listening to this page during flow navigation. In other words, the pages that are depending on the values/conditions from this page. The flow rules of those listening pages will be triggered after this page's process is completed.
CustomField.label: Listener Page Names
